stats.type: Proven Variants â€” Based on 44K-922K view reels

scripts.title: React: AI tool used for something insane
hooks: Bro. Somebody just used AI to do something that should NOT be legal.
I just found something and I genuinely don't know how to react to this.
This is why people are scared of AI. And honestly? They should be.
scripts.full_script:
[Find a controversial AI use case that week â€” racist tool, deepfake scandal, privacy violation, etc.]

Show it on screen. React genuinely.

Structure:
1. Show the thing (screen recording or screenshot)
2. React â€” 'bro what is this'
3. Explain why it's wild â€” give the technical detail
4. Give your real opinion â€” don't sit on the fence
5. End with a question to the audience

KEY: Don't script this. Find the thing, hit record, react naturally. The less polished, the better.
scripts.notes: Baroobi's #1 format. Find controversial AI use case each week â†’ react. 922K views on original.

scripts.title: You're cooked â€” [breaking security/tech news]
hooks: If you're using [app/service] you're cooked. They just got hacked.
Stop what you're doing. [Company] just had the biggest data breach of the year.
[X] million users just got exposed. If you have an account, here's what to do RIGHT NOW.
scripts.full_script:
[Wait for a data breach or security scandal to drop]

1. HOOK: 'If you're using X, you're cooked'
2. What happened â€” the breach, the numbers
3. 'Part of me doesn't want to make this video'
4. Technical breakdown â€” what was exposed, what wasn't
5. 'So you're thinking you're safe? First of all, you're beyond cooked'
6. Explain cross-referencing attacks
7. What to do â€” specific steps
8. End: 'So yeah, stop [doing the thing]'

KEY: Urgency + actual technical value. Not fear-mongering â€” give real fixes.
scripts.notes: Repeatable every time there's a breach. 844K views on original.

scripts.title: Everyone's using [trending thing] wrong
hooks: If you just set up [trending tool] you're probably already hacked.
Everyone's downloading [tool] right now. 90% of them are setting it up completely wrong.
[Tool] is going mega viral. But security researchers just found something terrifying.
scripts.full_script:
[Pick any trending AI tool, app, or software]

1. HOOK: 'everyone is doing X and they're all cooked'
2. What's going viral â€” the hype, the downloads
3. 'The thing is, people are setting it up very wrong'
4. The scary stat â€” 'researchers found X servers vulnerable'
5. What's exposed â€” API keys, messages, data
6. 'Here's how to fix this in three seconds'
7. Step 1, Step 2, Step 3 â€” simple fixes
8. 'And please stop [doing the wrong thing]'
9. CTA: Follow for more

KEY: Trend-jack + warn + give a 3-step fix. Value bomb.
scripts.notes: Works every time something goes viral. 248K views on original.

scripts.title: Day 1: Can [AI tool] make $1000 in 7 days?
hooks: Is it possible to make $1,000 with AI in one week? Let's find out.
Everyone says AI can make you money. Nobody's actually tested it. Until now.
I'm giving an AI agent 7 days and zero budget. Day 1 starts now.
scripts.full_script:
1. HOOK: Question â€” 'Is it possible to make $X with [AI tool] in Y days?'
2. Show the tool â€” quick visual of what it is
3. The idea â€” 'here's what I'm going to try'
4. Why â€” 'everyone talks about this but nobody actually tests it'
5. The setup â€” show the tech, the plan
6. Day 1 results â€” honest, including failures
7. Cliff hanger: 'Follow for day 2 to see if this actually works'

KEY: Series format. Each episode ends with a reason to follow. Be honest about failures â€” that's what makes it real.
scripts.notes: SERIES FORMAT â€” creates follow momentum. 231K views on Day 1. Keep going Day 2, 3, etc.

scripts.title: Who am I â€” 1 minute credibility intro
hooks: My name is Albert. I'm 18. Here's a one minute summary of what I've built.
I started my first company at 17. Here's what happened in 12 months.
18 years old, running an AI company in Norway. Here's the 60-second version.
scripts.full_script:
1. HOOK: Name + age + '60 second summary'
2. Visual proof â€” show the business, the setup, the Mac Mini
3. Real numbers â€” clients, revenue, what you've built
4. The failures â€” 'I started with shower filters, it didn't work'
5. What you learned â€” the lesson that led to the real business
6. What you do now â€” AI automation for Norwegian businesses
7. Why you're sharing â€” 'who is saying something matters more than what'
8. CTA: 'If this gives you value, follow. I'm sharing everything.'

KEY: Pin this video. Specific numbers > vague claims. Mention failures â€” it builds trust.
scripts.notes: Pin to profile. Every new follower sees this first. 67K views on Simon's version.

scripts.title: Sounds scammy. It isn't. [Book/video/idea recommendation]
hooks: Listen to the title: 'How to get rich without getting lucky.' Sounds scammy. It isn't.
This video changed how I think about money. And no, it's not what you think.
I watched a 3-hour video by a billionaire. Here's the one thing that hit me.
scripts.full_script:
1. HOOK: Title of the thing that sounds scammy
2. 'When I first saw this I thought it was another cringe get-rich-quick thing'
3. 'But actually it's the opposite. It's about [real insight].'
4. Break down 2-3 key ideas from the content
5. The personal hit â€” 'this part got me because I keep telling myself [self-doubt]'
6. The uncomfortable truth
7. End vulnerable: 'I'm not more disciplined than you. I'm just trying to learn.'
8. 'If you're up late working on something â€” you are not alone.'

KEY: The vulnerability at the end is what makes this format work. Not a flex â€” it's real.
scripts.notes: Works for any book, podcast, video. The 'sounds scammy' contrarian hook is powerful. 65K views.

scripts.title: Rant: Stop doing [dumb thing in tech/AI]
hooks: All of these people running AI bots with zero security are about to have a very bad day.
I'm genuinely tired of seeing people [doing dumb thing]. It's not even funny anymore.
Bro. Do you realize what you just did? You literally [explain the mistake].
scripts.full_script:
1. HOOK: Frustrated statement about people doing something wrong
2. 'Honestly it's not even funny at this point'
3. Describe the problem â€” what people are doing
4. 'I'm sitting here thinking bro, do you realize what you just did?'
5. The consequences â€” what can go wrong
6. 'The worst part? They don't even know they're exposed'
7. Simple advice: 'learn [basic thing] first'
8. End: 'Please.'

KEY: Comes from genuine concern, not superiority. The 'please' at the end shows you care.
scripts.notes: Rant format. Find something people are doing wrong in your niche â†’ frustrated commentary. 61K views.

scripts.title: One person, $10K, 8 months â†’ $850K. Here's how.
hooks: One person. $10K. No employees. 8 months later: $850K in a single month.
The rules of business just changed. And most people haven't caught up.
This is the most important shift in business since the internet. And nobody's talking about it.
scripts.full_script:
1. HOOK: Specific proof â€” numbers, timeframe, 'no employees'
2. 'This is the full-stack revolution'
3. Old way vs new way â€” 'I used to need [X people]. Now it takes one.'
4. The framework: AI + global infrastructure + algorithm distribution
5. Specific tools: Shopify, Meta cost caps, 3PL, AI customer service
6. 'This isn't a side hustle. This is a one person $10M business.'
7. The uncomfortable truth: 'skills are depreciating faster than ever'
8. Examples of roles collapsing
9. 'This isn't about being replaced. It's about roles collapsing.'

KEY: Need credibility to pull this off. Use real examples. Simon's credibility ($300M exit) makes this land.
scripts.notes: Bold claims need proof. Use real case studies. 44K views.

scripts.title: Everything that just happened in AI today
hooks: Alright let me walk you through what just happened because this is getting ridiculous.
5 insane things happened in AI in the last 24 hours. Most people missed all of them.
The AI news from today is so wild I had to make this immediately.
scripts.full_script:
1. HOOK: 'Let me walk you through what just happened'
2. Story 1 â€” the craziest one first. Quick, punchy.
3. 'But we're just getting started'
4. Story 2 â€” build on the urgency
5. 'And it gets worse'
6. Story 3 â€” the one that makes people think
7. 'Let that sink in'
8. Story 4-5 â€” rapid fire
9. 'All of this in one single day'
10. Hot take / call to action: 'The ground is shifting. Follow to stay ahead.'

KEY: Easy to do weekly. Just collect 4-5 craziest AI stories. Rapid pacing. No long pauses.
scripts.notes: Repeatable weekly. Low effort, high views. Just stack the news. 50K views.

scripts.title: Day [X]: Update on the experiment
hooks: Day 3. Remember that AI experiment? Here's what happened while I was sleeping.
Update: the AI agent found its first customer. I'm not kidding.
So the comments said this was all a marketing stunt. Let me show you what happened.
scripts.full_script:
1. HOOK: Reference the series â€” 'remember the experiment?'
2. Address comments / skeptics â€” 'people said X, let me show you'
3. Show real progress â€” screen recordings, data, results
4. The honest part â€” what went wrong
5. New idea or pivot based on what happened
6. Show the tool / setup in action
7. Cliff hanger: 'We need one person to say yes. Follow for day [X+1].'

KEY: Address skeptics directly. Show proof. End with cliffhanger. Each day builds momentum.
scripts.notes: Continuation of the Day X series. Each episode references the last. 77K views on Day 3.
